author: Sam Reynolds
title: Asia Morning Briefing: Miners and Whales Dumping BTC Amid Rally May Signal 'Local Top'
description: BTC’s rally to all-time highs triggered the largest miner sell-off since April, with 16K BTC moved to exchanges.
content: Welcome to Asia Morning Briefing, a daily summary of top stories during U.S. hours and an overview of market moves and analysis. For a detailed overview of U.S. markets, see CoinDesk's Crypto Daybook… [+3064 chars]
